content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
No new structures have been successfully created during these steps. Multiple attempts were made to place a Lab at position (0.5, 2.5), but all failed due to unavailable lab items and resource shortages. Although furnaces (one at Position(x=5.0, y=5.0) and another at Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0)) were retrieved for smelting operations, these were pre‐existing entities and not newly built by the agent.

ERROR TIPS
- Incorrect API usage for entity retrieval:
  • Avoid supplying unsupported keyword arguments (e.g. “radius”) or extra positional arguments to get_entities. Always verify the expected signature before calling the function.
  
- Lab placement failures:
  • Ensure that the required lab item is available in the inventory before attempting placement.
  • Check that any function returning entities does not yield None; if so, substitute with an empty list to safely iterate.
  
- Lab crafting errors due to missing sub-ingredients:
  • Confirm that all necessary sub-components (such as iron-gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, copper-cables, and their precursor items) are available or can be properly produced.
  • Validate the complete resource chain—including appropriate smelting or crafting capabilities—prior to initiating lab production.
  
- Consistent resource shortages:
  • Monitor and update resource production (e.g. through additional smelting steps) to meet the requirements of complex recipes before reattempting crafting operations.
